availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Reynerson (wagon maker in Mercer County)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Reynerson. Father of Nancy J. Reynerson, John Reynerson, William F. Reynerson, Samuel Reynerson, and Susan M. Reynerson. Wagon maker in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, District 2, p. 112. Find A Grave, “James Reynerson (April 22, 1824-August 29, 1880),” Memorial #75435489, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=75435489 (accessed June 4, 2017).
